page.title: 02Tourism.
page.content: Every year tourists come to Kylerhea to see the landscape and some of the people who are living there.Some tourists take a path throught the hills to see the lighthouse which is about a mile along the shore.There are other tourists who come just for the walk and the veiw.Some of the tourists that come camp by the rivers side.There is a bed and breakfast house in Kylerhea for the tourists that come each year.There are no hotels in Kylerhea because the land is very rough and not many people go to Kylerhea.
